original_title: Smith, James O. - Organist, USA. 2. Ein Jazz-Organist in Amerika
overview: Jazz and its milieu. Klaus Wildenhahn films the Jimmy Smith Trio in New York. With the addition of a white guitarist, Kenny Burrell, the band is in the studio recording the Rolling Stones current hit “Satisfaction”, as a tribute to the successful British Beat musicians, who were themselves inspired by blues and jazz.
title: Smith, James O. - Organist, USA. 2. Ein Jazz-Organist in Amerika
